comment: /**  * Determine the next execution time according to the given trigger context.  * @param triggerContext context object encapsulating last execution times  * and last completion time  * @return the next execution time as defined by the trigger,  * or {@code null} if the trigger won't fire anymore  */
code: /**  * Determine the next execution time according to the given trigger context.  * @param triggerContext context object encapsulating last execution times  * and last completion time  * @return the next execution time as defined by the trigger,  * or {@code null} if the trigger won't fire anymore  */ @Nullable Date nextExecutionTime(TriggerContext triggerContext).
